thread.title: Lifetime's 'Britney Ever After' Trailer Recreates Head Shaving Moment
thread.title_full: Lifetime's 'Britney Ever After' Trailer Recreates Head Shaving Moment

author: Just Jared
title: Lifetime's 'Britney Ever After' Trailer Recreates Head Shaving Moment
text:
The trailer for Lifetime’s upcoming movie Britney Ever After , based on the life of superstar Britney Spears , has been released.
Natasha Bennett is playing the singer and the footage from the film shows off her life in the spotlight and also her very public meltdown, including her head shaving moment and when she attack paparazzi with an umbrella. 
“I’m not going to say I’m fine ‘cuz I wasn’t,” Natasha ‘s version of Britney says in the clip.
The movie is going to feature her ex-boyfriend Justin Timberlake and his NSync bandmates, as well as her marriage to Kevin Federline .
Britney Ever After , which does not have the support of Britney and her team, airs on February 18.
